DOC.brief_summary: Investigators aim study effectiveness safety inhale hydrogen-oxygen produce hydrogen generator nebulizer decrease inspiratory effort patient tracheal stenosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Effectiveness Safety Hydrogen Generator Treat Dyspnea Patients With Tracheal Stenosis : A Randomized , Double-blind Single-center Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 18 65 ; 2 . Diagnosed moderate/severe tracheal stenosis chest CT and/or bronchoscopy ; 3 . Difficulty breathe symptom 4 . Agree participate trial sign inform consent form . 1 . Those suffered respiratory failure severe cause dyspnea ; 2 . Combined serious systemic disease ( severe arrhythmia , acute myocardial ischemia , uncontrollable hypertension crisis , active gastric ulcer , uncontrolled diabetes , renal failure , blood system diseases coagulation dysfunction ) ; 3 . Those suffer severe mental illness could take care ; 4 . Pregnant lactating woman ; 5 . Those could understand trial procedure correctly trial equipment ; 6 . Those participated clinical trial first 3 month screen date . Quit criteria 1 . The subject require emergency intubation intervention surgical treatment due worsen tracheal stenosis ; 2 . Subjects severe adverse event treatment ; 3 . Subjects want continue participate trial ; 4 . The subject necessarily terminate trial investigator .
DOC.keyword: Tracheal stenosis , Hydrogen generator , Hydrogen-oxygen , Dyspnea .
